feed.title: PeaNUT Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Reduce CPU load from InfluxDB by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/133
  • Switch to Material UI Charts by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/134
  • Add Language Switcher by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/135

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v4.3.0...v4.4.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix chokidar on NFS by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/143
  • Fix Chart Regressions by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/141

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v4.4.0...v4.4.1

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.4.2

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.4.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Final chart touchups by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/146
  • Update it translations by @ildoc in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/150
  • Fix broken environment variables by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/148

New Contributors

  • @ildoc made their first contribution in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/150

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v4.4.2...v4.4.3

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v4.4.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Better settings tests by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/152
  • Bump actions/checkout from 4.1.0 to 4.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/153
  • Fix status for some users by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/155

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v4.4.3...v4.4.4
